bike.description: Stumpjumper FSR M5 manipulated alloy frame, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 140mm travel

components.description: Specialized/Fox AFR Brain Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, rebound adj. and Brain Fade, 7.875x1.9" Integrated cartridge bearing shock mount.
Campy style cartridge bearings for integrated alloy HT
Shimano M770 XT, DMD, top swing, dual pull
Thomson Elite Setback w/ 12 degree clamp, S/M: 367mm L/XL:410mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
